entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries. Temperature rising to zero by morning. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 30 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind south 20 km/h gusting to 40 becoming light early this evening. Temperature rising to zero by morning. Wind chill minus 15 this evening. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. High plus 2. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries or drizzle in the afternoon. Wind becoming southwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. High plus 2. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023

entry.title: Sunday night: Flurries. Low minus 3.
entry.summary: A few flurries ending near midnight then cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Flurries or drizzle early in the evening. Risk of freezing drizzle overnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 40 late in the evening. Low minus 3. Wind chill minus 9 overnight. Forecast issued 3:30 PM EST Saturday 04 February 2023
